mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_rating_agg(product_id, avg_rating, total_reviews, last_updated) VALUES (#{productId}, #{avgRating}, #{totalReviews}, #{lastUpdated})

insert into game_product(product_id, product_name, description, product_images, category, status, supplier_info, created_at, updated_at, price, detail_content) values (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{description}, #{productImages}, #{category}, #{status}, #{supplierInfo}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{price}, #{detailContent})
mapper.update:
update game_product
product_name = #{productName},
description = #{description},
product_images = #{productImages},
category = #{category},
status = #{status},
supplier_info = #{supplierInfo},
price = #{price},
detail_content = #{detailContent},
updated_at = #{updatedAt}
where product_id = #{productId}

update product_rating_agg
avg_rating = #{avgRating},
total_reviews = #{totalReviews},
last_updated = #{lastUpdated},
where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select gp.product_id, gp.product_name, gp.description, gp.product_images, gp.category, gp.status, gp.supplier_info, gp.created_at, gp.updated_at,gp.price,gp.detail_content, pra.avg_rating, pra.total_reviews, pra.last_updated from game_product gp join product_rating_agg pra on gp.product_id = pra.product_id where gp.product_id = #{productId}
